title: (x) Eddmond - Eurostile Ext {Mike Y, Karl}
content: We surch to by this fonts and this is stop to distrib. Do you know where we can find it or something close to.
author: lehtman

comments.content: Eddmond is the same as [Eurotile Extended](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124111/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/eurostile/). Several foundries have versions, including URW.
